structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The provisions of KRS 77.150 to 77.175 do not apply within any air pollution control district unless and until, pursuant to resolution and ordinance as provided in KRS 77.010 to 77.060, such air pollution control district may function and exercise its powers.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 420, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 34, effective March 14, 1952.
